page.title: 18HEALTH
page.content: Knighton has two doctors surgeries. One surgery is in Wylcwm Street and the doctors are Dr.B.C.Davies and Dr. R.Croft.The other surgery is at Whitehall and the doctors are Dr.K. Howcroft and Dr.Gray. Knighton has a cottage hospital and this hospital is a geriatric and maternity hospital.It has recently had a physiotherapy unit added to it. There are two dental practices in Knighton and one optician. The Knighton Clinic adjoins the hospital.The Community Nurses,Health Visitor,School Nurse,Schools Medical Officer,Chiropodist and the speech therapist work at the Clinic. The Health Visitor visits children who have not started school at their homes to check that they are healthy and that they are growing properly. .
